title: ESPN's Rachel Nichols
description:
ESPN’s Rachel Nichols joins The Woj Pod to discuss Bubble Basketball, the environment for players, challenges for restarting the NBA next season and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
